AccessSystem.Logging

Class AccessLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • AccessSystem.Logging.AccessLogger
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class AccessLogger
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

    Access Logger Class

    Formats information which is the logged by the base logger class and keeps a list of all entries made.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AccessLogger(java.lang.String uniName, Controller controller)
      Default constructor that makes a new instance of the base logger class and a initialises loggerEntries as an ArrayList.
